name: bixbyVolume_decrease
description: This function is used to lower the volume of Bixby's voice on SmartThings devices.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to decrease Bixby's volume.

parameters.name: volumeLevelDelta
parameters.description: The amount by which to decrease Bixby's volume level.
